And when they had <S%G1210>bound<s%> him, they <S%G520>led<s%> him <S%G520>away,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him to <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> him, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he was <S%G2632>condemned,<s%> <S%G3338>repented<s%> himself, and <S%G654>brought<s%> <S%G654>again<s%> the <S%G5144>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%G694>silver<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> in that I have <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> the <S%G121>innocent<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%> And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> is that to us? <S%G3700>see<s%> you to that.
And he <S%G4496>cast<s%> <S%G4496>down<s%> the pieces of <S%G694>silver<s%> in the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and <S%G402>departed,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G519>hanged<s%> himself.

And they <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel,<s%> and <S%G59>bought<s%> with them the <S%G2763>potter's<s%> <S%G68>field,<s%> to <S%G5027>bury<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> in.
<S%G1352>Why<s%> that <S%G68>field<s%> was <S%G2564>called,<s%> The <S%G68>field<s%> of <S%G129>blood,<s%> to <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by <S%G2408>Jeremy<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> And they <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G5144>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%G694>silver,<s%> the <S%G5092>price<s%> of him that was <S%G5091>valued,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> did <S%G5091>value;<s%>
And <S%G1325>gave<s%> them for the <S%G2763>potter's<s%> <S%G68>field,<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4929>appointed<s%> me.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G2232>governor:<s%> and the <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1488>Are<s%> you the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, You say. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> to him, <S%G191>Hear<s%> you not <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> things they <S%G2649>witness<s%> against you?

For he <S%G1492>knew<s%> that for <S%G5355>envy<s%> they had <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him.

But the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> that they should <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas,<s%> and <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>What<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> They <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, Let him be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

When <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he could <S%G5623>prevail<s%> <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> but that <S%G3123>rather<s%> a <S%G2351>tumult<s%> was <S%G1096>made,<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G5204>water,<s%> and <S%G633>washed<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G561>before<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G121>innocent<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> person: <S%G3700>see<s%> you to it.
<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> His <S%G129>blood<s%> be <S%G1909>on<s%> us, and <S%G1909>on<s%> our <S%G5043>children.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G630>released<s%> he <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> to them: and when he had <S%G5417>scourged<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> of the <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4232>common<s%> <S%G4232>hall,<s%> and <S%G4863>gathered<s%> to him the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4686>band<s%> of soldiers.

And when they had <S%G4120>platted<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G173>thorns,<s%> they <S%G2007>put<s%> it on his <S%G2776>head,<s%> and a <S%G2563>reed<s%> in his <S%G1188>right<s%> hand: and they <S%G1120>bowed<s%> the knee <S%G1715>before<s%> him, and <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5463>Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>
And they <S%G1716>spit<s%> on him, and <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and <S%G5180>smote<s%> him <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G2776>head.<s%>

And <S%G3753>after<s%> that they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, they <S%G1562>took<s%> the <S%G5511>robe<s%> <S%G1562>off<s%> from him, and <S%G1746>put<s%> his own <S%G2440>raiment<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> him, and <S%G520>led<s%> him <S%G520>away<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him.

And as they <S%G1831>came<s%> out, they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2957>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> by <S%G3686>name:<s%> him they <S%G29>compelled<s%> to <S%G142>bear<s%> his <S%G4716>cross.<s%>
And when they were <S%G2064>come<s%> to a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha,<s%> that is to <S%G3004>say,<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> of a <S%G2898>skull,<s%>

They <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G3690>vinegar<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G5521>gall:<s%> and when he had <S%G1089>tasted<s%> thereof, he <S%G2309>would<s%> not <S%G4095>drink.<s%>

And they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> him, and <S%G1266>parted<s%> his <S%G2440>garments,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> <S%G2819>lots:<s%> that it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> They <S%G1266>parted<s%> my <S%G2440>garments<s%> among them, and on my <S%G2441>clothing<s%> did they <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots.<s%>
And <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G2521>down<s%> they <S%G5083>watched<s%> him <S%G1563>there;<s%>
And <S%G2007>set<s%> up <S%G1883>over<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> his <S%G156>accusation<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3778>THIS<s%> IS <S%G2424>JESUS<s%> THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> were there <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3027>thieves<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> with him, <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, and <S%G1520>another<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G2176>left.<s%>
And they that <S%G3899>passed<s%> by <S%G987>reviled<s%> him, <S%G2795>wagging<s%> their <S%G2776>heads,<s%>

He <S%G3982>trusted<s%> in <S%G2316>God;<s%> let him <S%G4506>deliver<s%> him <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2309>will<s%> have him: for he <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
The <S%G3027>thieves<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with him, <S%G3679>cast<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> in his <S%G3679>teeth.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> from the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> there was <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> to the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G310>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2241>Eli,<s%> <S%G2241>Eli,<s%> <S%G2982>lama<s%> sabachthani? <S%G4518><s%> that is to say, My <S%G2316>God,<s%> my <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2444>why<s%> have you <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> me?
<S%G5100>Some<s%> of them that <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that, <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G5455>calls<s%> for <S%G2243>Elias.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them <S%G5143>ran,<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge,<s%> and <S%G4130>filled<s%> it with <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> it <S%G4060>on<s%> a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and <S%G4222>gave<s%> him to drink.
The <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G863>Let<s%> be, let us <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elias<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> him.
<S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when he had <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G863>yielded<s%> up the <S%G4151>ghost.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>rent<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> from the <S%G509>top<s%> to the <S%G2736>bottom;<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> did <S%G4579>quake,<s%> and the <S%G4073>rocks<s%> <S%G4977>rent;<s%>
And the <S%G3419>graves<s%> were <S%G455>opened;<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2837>slept<s%> <S%G1453>arose,<s%>

And <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3419>graves<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> his <S%G1454>resurrection,<s%> and <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G1718>appeared<s%> to <S%G4183>many.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> and they that were with him, <S%G5083>watching<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> things that were <S%G1096>done,<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G4970>greatly,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G230>Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> was the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> were <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2334>beholding<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1247>ministering<s%> to him:

<S%G1722>Among<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> and the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedees<s%> <S%G5207>children.<s%>

When the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> was <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> <S%G3100>disciple:<s%>

He <S%G4334>went<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> and <S%G154>begged<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> to be <S%G591>delivered.<s%>
